title: The Week in pictures. Issue no. 296
brief_description: Newsreel footage. Includes: 1. Clock built into pavement. 2. In the park, bag snatcher repelled with dye. 3. Hair stylist “experimental hairdo”. 4. Wartime frogman and expert driver - exploring the depths of the Mediterranean. Underwater photography, concentrating on its potential to assist salvage operations, and marine science in general.
